{ 'msgtype': 'markdown', 'enable_duplicate_check': False, 'safe': True, 'wxwork_body_html': ' Your Account
 # ${object.name}

 Dear ${object.name},

 A password reset was requested for the Odoo account linked to this email.
 You may change your password by following this link which will remain valid during 24 hours:
 [Change password](${object.signup_url})
 If you do not expect this, you can safely ignore this email.

 Thanks

 # ${object.company_id.name}

 ${object.company_id.phone} 
 % if object.company_id.email 
 | [${object.company_id.email}](mailto:${object.company_id.email}) 
 % endif 
 % if object.company_id.website 
 | [${object.company_id.website}](${object.company_id.website}) 
 % endif 
 ', }

{ 'msgtype': 'markdown', 'enable_duplicate_check': False, 'wxwork_body_html': ' Welcome to Odoo\n **${object.name}**\n\n ----\n Dear ${object.name},\n\n You have been invited by ${object.create_uid.name} of ${object.company_id.name} to connect on Odoo\n [Accept invitation](${object.signup_url})\n % set website_url = object.env["ir.config_parameter"].sudo().get_param("web.base.url") Your Odoo domain is: **[${website_url}](${website_url})**\n Your sign in email is: **${object.email}**\n\n The ${object.company_id.name} Team\n\n ----\n **${object.company_id.name}**\n ${object.company_id.phone} % if object.company_id.email | ${object.company_id.email} % endif % if object.company_id.website | ${object.company_id.website} % endif ', }
